user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfort and support in my undergarments, especially considering my current physical limitations.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a product that would provide great support while being lightweight and breathable. The positive rating and my previous experiences with similar items influenced my decision to purchase this, as I wanted something reliable and comfortable.

I needed a comfortable and easy-to-wear undergarment that would accommodate my current shoulder injury. The product's description highlighted its soft fabric and front-close design, which appealed to my need for convenience and support during recovery. The high rating and the mention of its effectiveness for active lifestyles also played a role in my decision.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are comfortable, well-fitting, and made from high-quality materials. I value items that offer good support, especially in clothing and footwear, and appreciate features like adjustable straps and versatile designs. I also tend to favor products that maintain their quality after washing, such as not shrinking or losing shape. Additionally, I enjoy a variety of colors and styles, as long as they are functional and practical for everyday use. On the other hand, I dislike items that have poor fit, such as overly wide straps or cuts that do not flatter my body shape. I also find it frustrating when products lack adequate support or comfort, particularly in footwear. Overall, I seek a balance of style, comfort, and durability in my purchases.

conversation.content: I want to find undergarments that offer both comfort and support, considering my current physical limitations. within my expected price range: [10.25, 65.0]
What specific physical limitations should the undergarments accommodate to ensure both comfort and support for you?

The undergarments should accommodate my current shoulder injury, so I need something that offers support without putting extra strain on my shoulders. Comfort is crucial for me, especially during recovery, so the undergarment should be easy to wear and gentle on my skin.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Rosette Women’s Sleeveless Undershirt - Cotton – High Neck, Full shoulder design> / Item ID: B07BTSGMCV / Price: $11.98 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Tops Tees & Blouses', 'Tanks & Camis'] / Description: ['From the cradle to the coffin, underwear comes first!', 'As underwear is hidden beneath clothing, it is easy to believe that it does not require much forethought and that anything will do. But that is untrue, you not only need something that looks nice, but more importantly something that offers ultimate comfort.Your underwear should feel good and not distract from activity your taking part in.', 'GENERAL FEATURES:', 'Made of 100% Extra fine durable, soft Cotton for superior comfort Classic fit, perfect for layering Available in many sizes & colors (Check size chart above) Full shoulder design for a conservative appearance High neckline for a Modest Coverage Machine wash warm. Tumble dry low', 'Comfort + Quality + Style', "The Rosette Sleeveless Tank Top Undershirt is a must-have in any women's closet. The extra soft cotton material allows for all day wear during any type of activity, whether you're at the office or at home.Full shouldered tank straps conceal bra straps for a more put together look. With high neckline, great for anyone looking for extended coverage. They are very stretchy with a Nice ribbon trim around the neck and arms.", 'Natural Cotton – Eco-Friendly', 'Ideal for women with Sensitive skin and Sensory issues. Great for Sleeping, Lounging, Pajamas and Just for layering, or plain wearing clean finish bottom to wear tucked in or tucked out with the everyday essentials.', 'Get it, Feel it, Prove it!', 'Get the Rosette’s top rated tank shirt for ladies and girls today by clicking “Add to Cart” on top of the page and feel the difference.'] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Bali Women's Comfort Revolution Seamless Hi-Cut> / Item ID: B08YXC41MD / Price: $8.66 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['A no-ride-up design, Bali® women’s Comfort Revolution® hi-cut panty is made for the woman on-the-go. Designed with Cool Comfort® moisture-wicking nylon fabric, this women’s panty will keep you comfortable all-day long. The high-cut, seamless panty features a tag-free design that won’t chafe or dig. Narrow leg bands and a knit-in waistband help minimize panty lines for a smooth finish. A classic high-rise design, Bali® seamless women’s underwear offers full front and back coverage so you can move with confidence.'] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Vanity Fair Women's Comfort Where It Counts No Ride Up Panties> / Item ID: B0BT1JH79J / Price: $25.2 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['Get consistant comfort in this silky soft hi-cut brief, Convenient 3-pack. Clothing easily glides over the slick fabric, Minimize panty lines with micro-plush, elastic leg bands. No-roll, no ride-up with the flat elastic waistband Brand: Vanity Fair, Style Number: 13464. Body: 89% Nylon, 11% Spandex.']
